source:
%%sql
-- Build the IMS historic info table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_attribute_dim (
    IMSAttributeID,
    BDCAID,
    AttributeID,
    BDCAttributeName,
    BDCAttributeNumber,
    BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IMSAttributeHelp,
    IsSpecialCategoryData,
    RetentionPeriod,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IMSAttributeFkBDCEID,
    IMSAttributeDateModified,
    IMSAttributeSecurityGroups,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserID,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserLink,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserName,
    IMSAttributeCreatedBy,
    IMSAttributeCreatedByLink,
    IMSAttributeCreatedByName,
    IMSAttributeDateEntered,
    IMSAttributeDeleted,
    IMSAttributeDescription,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByName,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByUserID,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByUserLink,
    IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT
    Row_Number() over (Order by T1.BDCAttributeNumberContainer NULLS LAST) AS IMSAttributeID,
    IFNULL(T1.bdca_id, 'No Info') AS BDCAID,
    IFNULL(T1.id, 'No Info') AS AttributeID,
    IFNULL(T1.bdc_attribute_name, 'No Info') AS BDCAttributeName,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number, 'No Info') AS BDCAttributeNumber,
    IFNULL(T1.bdc_attribute_num_container, 'No Info') AS BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    IFNULL(T1.minimise_after_processing_c, 'No Info') AS MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IFNULL(T1.help, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeHelp,
    IFNULL(T1.is_this_special_category_data, 'No Info') AS IsSpecialCategoryData,
    IFNULL(T1.retention_period, 'No Info') AS RetentionPeriod,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1_name, 'No Info') AS IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1ims_bdc_entity_ida, 'No Info') AS IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IFNULL(T1.fk_bdce_id, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeFkBDCEID,
    IFNULL(T1.date_modified, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeDateModified,
    IFNULL(T1.SecurityGroups, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeSecurityGroups,
    IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeAssignedUserID,
    IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeAssignedUserLink,
    IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeAssignedUserName,
    IFNULL(T1.created_by, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeCreatedBy,
    IFNULL(T1.created_by_link, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeCreatedByLink,
    IFNULL(T1.created_by_name, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeCreatedByName,
    IFNULL(T1.date_entered, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeDateEntered,
    IFNULL(T1.deleted, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeDeleted,
    IFNULL(T1.description, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeDescription,
    IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeModifiedByName,
    IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeModifiedByUserID,
    IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeModifiedByUserLink,
    IFNULL(T1.work_log, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    7 as SourceSystemID,
    First(to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.Cost_Ctr,'.'), IFNULL(first(T1.Cost_Centre),'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "IMS" = T2.Description
WHERE T1.BDCAttributeNumberContainer IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY T1.BDCAttributeNumberContainer
